rooms.description: Two-car garage located towards the south for easy vehicle entry and exit; designed with Vastu considerations ensuring the absence of obstacles in front.

Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen, featuring large windows on the east and west for natural light while preserving privacy; layout adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring a smooth flow of energy.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with living area, designed with Vastu-compliant placement to encourage positive energy and proper alignment of water elements.
Master bedroom on the northern side with ample natural light; designed according to Vastu for prosperity and restful sleep, ensuring minimal exposure to east-west winds.
Secondary bedroom placed adjacent to the master bedroom or on the north side to balance energy flow as per Vastu; designed for privacy and calm ambience.
Attached bathroom for convenience, designed with Vastu principles ensuring water elements are balanced; located near the bedrooms for easy access.

openings.description: North-facing entrance to allow maximum natural light and positive energy flow according to Vastu principles; entry is designed with wide steps and minimal obstacles to ensure smooth transition.
Large windows on the east and west sides of living area and bedrooms, ensuring balanced sunlight and ventilation while preserving privacy.
Balcony providing access to exterior space for relaxation; designed with minimal interference as per Vastu guidelines.
